sequence:
The Holy Night of Love and Peace

<size=45>Chapter 6 - A Holy Night's Dinner</size>

scripts.say: Port - Royal Navy Dormitory
Christmas dinner is now ready. We hope you will find it to your liking.
I helped with it too!

Well done! We aren't proud over our maid fleet for nothing! You may participate in our party as well! ...And the rest of you have done your part as well! Today you may enjoy yourselves to your heart's content!
C-Christmas dinner... With turkey... Christmas pudding... and prawns to start... L-let's dig in!
Ah, it's so delicious!
This is really good, too!
Ahh~ I'm so glad I was born to experience this~
Seeing how Cygnet eats always makes me jealous for some reason...
Sigh... Just what happens to all that fat... W-wait, maybe it goes straight to her...?!
S-s-so that's why, huh?! I-I need to start eating more, then!
C-Crescent... Yesterday I had a lesson where they taught us about this... that eating a lot will just make you gain weight, and never where you want it to...
T-that's unfair! Dang it... We're all part of the C-class, so why is she different?!
Huh? Why aren't you two eating anything? It'd be a waste to not eat all this delicious food they made...
Hmph! If it's come down to this then fine!
I-I think I'll have something, too!
Hahh... Ahh... The C-class sisters are even cuter than usual today!
I can understand being happy over great food, but you, Ark Royal...
I-I know my manners! I'm satisfied with just getting to watch cute destroyers being cute!
Now it's time to exchange presents with each other. You may all choose one present from this box. Oh, and you cannot return it once you've chosen.
In that case... I'll pick... this one!
W-wait, is this... a Christmas costume...?!
Why, that's the one I prepared. How interesting you would pick that one. Ahahah~ One should strike while the iron is hot, so may I ask you to change into it right now?
Gosh... But I just ate so much... Then again, it's your present, so...
H-how does it look...?
You need only look at Ark Royal's expression to know the answer to that~
What?! Ahhhh... This is so embarrassing...
